text: Omulangira anaayingiriranga mu kisasi okuva ebweru, n’ayimirira awali omufuubeeto ogw’omulyango. Bakabona banaateekateekanga ekiweebwayo kye ekyokebwa n’ebiweebwayo bye olw’emirembe. Anaasinzizanga awayingirirwa ku mulyango; n’oluvannyuma anaafulumanga, naye oluggi teluggalwenga okutuusa akawungeezi.
